sentences.english: Cy jordan silenced the warning horn .
sentences.chinese: 賽伊喬丹關掉了報警喇叭。

sentences.english: The two girls and Jordan leaned together confidentially.
sentences.chinese: 兩個姑娘和喬丹詭祕地把頭靠到一起。

sentences.english: This skill earned him the nicknames "Air Jordan" and "His Airness.
sentences.chinese: 這個技術爲他博得了飛人喬丹和空中傳奇的綽號。

sentences.english: Germany. The Michael Jordan of war took a pass.
sentences.chinese: 德國，戰爭的邁克爾喬丹，都不去。

sentences.english: Why on the Wedd body has Jordan's shadow?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼韋德身上有喬丹的影子？

sentences.english: These nagging injuries are things that Jordan never had to deal with.
sentences.chinese: 這些惱人的傷病，喬丹從未遇過。

sentences.english: Bill Gates and Michael Jordan are citizens of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 蓋茨和喬丹都是美國公民。

sentences.english: Michael Jordan used to reign as the number one basketball player in NBA.
sentences.chinese: 邁克爾喬丹曾是稱霸籃壇第一把交椅的球員。

sentences.english: Michael Jorden surnamed “Flying Trapezist” has stepped out of the NBA.
sentences.chinese: “空中飛人”邁克爾喬丹已從NBA中退役了。

sentences.english: This will most likely lead you to achieve and even have a better result than what MJ could do one day.
sentences.chinese: 這很可能讓你有一天達到喬丹的記錄，甚至超越他。

sentences.english: In addition to Jordan, Pippen, including many stars, including all mass at the time this pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 除了喬丹，包括皮蓬在內的衆多明星當時都傳這雙鞋。

sentences.english: It was the worst day of Jordan’s young life.
sentences.chinese: 對於年輕的喬丹來說這一天簡直遭透了。

sentences.english: Throughout his career, Jordan had 262 points in the game.
sentences.chinese: 在整個全明星賽歷史中上，喬丹總共拿到262分。

sentences.english: How about leting uncle Micheal Jordan help you to wear shoes ?
sentences.chinese: 讓邁克爾喬丹叔叔給你穿小鞋如何？
喬丹是所有運動員的完美典範。

sentences.english: Michael Jordon loved playing basketball when he was young .
sentences.chinese: 當邁克爾喬丹小的時候他就喜愛打籃球。
